page.title: 20 LOCAL ASSOCIATIONS
page.content: Community and parish associations offer facilities for group meetings and activities for local people. A typical week Monday to Friday would be : MORNINGS Playgroup AFTERNOONS Mothers and Toddlers, Mother's Union, Senior Citizens OR Music and Movement EVENINGS Brownies, Gardening Club, Youth Club, Guides, W.I., OR Ladies' Meeting. The facilities are sometimes made available for private parties at rates of about Â£6 for a children's party and Â£20 for an adult disco. The Egglescliffe Community College Association, started thirteen years ago, offers young people sports and other interests.
